casebody.data:
WALTON NORTH CAROLINA, LLC and Walton NC Concord, LP
v.
The CITY OF CONCORD, North Carolina No. 36P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Roy H. Michaux, Jr., Charlotte, Attorney at Law, James E. Scarbrough, Concord, Attorney at Law, Madeline J. Trilling, Attorney at Law, For Walton North Carolina, LLC, et al. G. Nicholas Herman, Chapel Hill, Attorney at Law, Valerie Kolczynski, Attorney at Law, For the City of Concord

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of January 2018 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
